trans-unit.source: Char deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.
If you've never choked on the embers of your own spell, you aren't casting it hard enough.

trans-unit.resname: P15A路2 | Kamahl, Pit Fighter | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) {T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to any target.

trans-unit.resname: P15A路2 | Kamahl, Pit Fighter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In times when freedom seems lost, great souls arise to reclaim it.
